statements: DELETE FROM health_records WHERE age > 40 AND diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
DELETE FROM health_records WHERE record_id = 5 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM health_records WHERE age > 50 AND diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND doctor = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND gender = 'M'
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE dosage = '1 pill';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE visit_id IN (SELECT visit_id FROM Visits WHERE visit_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM Lab_Results WHERE visit_id IN (SELECT visit_id FROM Visits WHERE symptoms LIKE '%fever%');
